summary.span: 命名空間提供類別，允許您與系統處理序 (Process)、事件記錄檔和效能計數器互動。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that allow you to interact with system processes, event logs, and performance counters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 元件提供寫入事件記錄檔、 讀取事件記錄檔項目，並且建立和刪除事件記錄檔和網路上的事件來源的功能。The component provides functionality to write to event logs, read event log entries, and create and delete event logs and event sources on the network. 提供方法來以非同步方式互動事件記錄檔。The provides a way to interact with event logs asynchronously. 支援的類別提供的存取權更詳細的控制項，包括： 權限限制，指定事件記錄檔類型 （這會控制的寫入事件記錄項目使用的預設資料類型），並逐一查看集合的事件記錄檔的能力項目。Supporting classes provide access to more detailed control, including: permission restrictions, the ability to specify event log types (which controls the type of default data that is written with an event log entry), and iterate through collections of event log entries. 如需有關這些工作的詳細資訊，請參閱， ，和類別。For more information about these tasks, see the , , and classes. - 類別會提供透過網路監視系統處理序，並且將啟動和停止本機系統處理序的功能。The class provides functionality to monitor system processes across the network, and to start and stop local system processes. 除了執行 （藉由指定電腦、 處理序名稱或處理序識別碼） 的處理程序或檢視之處理序的目前擁有的存取權的處理器資訊的清單，您可以取得處理序執行緒的詳細的知識，透過模組類別本身，並藉由互動和類別。In addition to retrieving lists of running processes (by specifying either the computer, the process name, or the process id) or viewing information about the process that currently has access to the processor, you can get detailed knowledge of process threads and modules both through the class itself, and by interacting with the and classes. 類別可讓您指定各種不同的項目用來啟動新的處理序，例如輸入、 輸出和錯誤資料流、 工作目錄和命令列動詞命令和引數。The class enables you to specify a variety of elements with which to start a new process, such as input, output, and error streams, working directories, and command line verbs and arguments. 這些可讓您處理序行為的良好控制。These give you fine control over the behavior of your processes. 其他相關的類別可讓您指定的視窗樣式，程序和執行緒的優先權，並與其互動之執行緒和模組的集合。Other related classes let you specify window styles, process and thread priorities, and interact with collections of threads and modules. - 類別可讓您監視系統效能而類別可用來建立新的自訂計數器和分類。The class enables you to monitor system performance, while the class provides a way to create new custom counters and categories. 您可以寫入至本機的自訂計數器，並讀取本機和遠端計數器 （系統以及自訂）。You can write to local custom counters and read from both local and remote counters (system as well as custom). 您可以取樣計數器使用類別，並計算結果，從使用後續的效能計數器樣本類別。You can sample counters using the class, and calculate results from successive performance counter samples using the class. 類別可讓您建立類別目錄中的多個計數器，並指定其類型。The class enables you to create multiple counters in a category and specify their types. 其他效能計數器元件相關聯的類別提供的計數器、 計數器使用權限和計數器型別集合的存取。Other classes associated with the performance counter component provide access to collections of counters, counter permission, and counter types. 命名空間提供類別，可讓您偵錯應用程式，並追蹤您的程式碼的執行。The namespace also provides classes that allow you to debug your application and to trace the execution of your code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和 類別。For more information, see the and classes.
